Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, Shape

    public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    Rectangle class represents rectangles. Rectangle class implements Shape interface's methods.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double xCoor,
         double yCoor,
         double rwidth,
         double rheight)
        Rectangle constructor which takes a x,y coordinate and also width and height
        Parameters:
        xCoor - x coordinate of the left top corner of the rectangle
        yCoor - y coordinate of the left top corner of the rectangle
        rwidth - width of the rectangle
        rheight - height of the rectangle
